lines.text: I'll tell you what. Why don't we take all these bricks and build a shelter for the homeless, so maybe your mother will have a place to stay.
Oh man shut your anorexic malnutrition tapeworm-having overdose on Dick Gregory Bahamian diet-drinking ass up. Leave me alone!

What, you still throwing up bricks? What is this, a Masons convention? Wha... clank, clank! I need, like, a welding torch to play in this league! I got an idea... let's just stop right now and gather up all these bricks and let's build a shelter for the homeless so maybe your mother will have a place to live!
When I say I wanna make love, it means, "Let's screw." That's the kind of thing I thought you would say.
I don't like the word "screw," OK? I prefer "make love" or "fuck." Screwing is for carpenters.
Oh, you're gonna get it!
Oh, honey!
Oh...
We're you going?
Anywhere to get the hell away from you. Psycho, chiquita nut case!
Oh, come back, I want to make love. Honey, come back, I want to screw!
Look man, you can listen to Jimi but you can't hear him. There's a difference man. Just because you're listening to him doesn't mean you're hearing him.

Sometimes when you win, you really lose, and sometimes when you lose, you really win, and sometimes when you win or lose, you actually tie, and sometimes when you tie, you actually win or lose. Winning or losing is all one organic mechanism, from which one extracts what one needs.
You can put a cat in an oven, but that don't make it a biscuit.
You are so stupid. It would take your mother 1, no. 2 hours to watch 60 MINUTES.
Don't start that shit again.
I don't mean to brag... but I'm the greatest!
Can anybody step in for this guy? Anybody? For Mr. Motherfucking March of Dimes?
Billy, listen to me. White men can't jump.
You calling me ugly?
Your mother did.
"Listen to the Woman".
What the hell does that mean, "Listen to the woman"? I TRIED to listen to the woman and you're the one who talked me out of it.
Wait a minute. I didn't talk you out of anything. I presented you with an option and you took it.
Teammates can't hustle each other.
Why not?
It's not artistic.
Hey hey man, what's the score? Yo! Chump! I'm talking to you! I'm talking to the fucking air.
My name ain't chump, it's Billy Hoyle.
Billy Hoyle. BILLY HOYLE. Billy Hoyle. Okay Billy... can you count to ten, Billy?
Yeah.
Good. What's the score... Billy?
I don't know.
Then you're a chump.
I may be a chump, I just said that wasn't my name.
All I care about is getting out of the Vista View apartments, because there ain't no "vista", there ain't no "view", and there certainly ain't no vista of no view.
You see Billy it's like this, you either smoke or you get smoked. And you got smoked.

[playing in tournament prelims-overdub]
Don't let him pull that move, don't let him pull that move! That's the move! Oh that's the move!

[insulting Billy]
Doesn't this guy look like one of those motherfuckers from The Brady Bunch?
Yeah! He looks like Cindy!
[sings, insulting Billy]
The youngest one in curls...
We goin' Sizzler, we goin' Sizzler...
He lives in The Jungle, right?
No honey, we can't. They don't let white people into the Crenshaw District. I don't know about Puerto Ricans but it's a reverse discrimination thing.
Yo, Billy, tomorrow we goin' to 3rd Street. We're goin' to hustle out there. That's Watts, tough games out there. Big bucks.
Um-hmm.
Don't take it personally, baby. We teammates. Ebony and Ivory.
Ha-ha-ha! Hey, I got your partner.
Oh,right. Fuck me. All I know is you better get your ass north of Le Brea before sunset.

Once again quoting myself,"a white man wants to win first look good second, a black man wants to look good first win second" that is the most ridiculous piece of philosophical BULLSHIT I have ever heard!
Either you're stupid or you're dangerous and you can't be stupid because stupid people can't push my buttons and piss me off so you must be dangerous
To who?
To yourself
Your mother's so poor I saw her kicking cans and I asked her what she was doing she said "moving"
Your mother's so old she used to drive chariots to high school
Your mother's so fat when she fell over, broke her leg and gravy poured out
I told your mother to act her age and the bitch dropped dead
Fuck you, your mother's astronaut
My mother was too drunk to be astronaut
You got a fine woman
You keep your hands off her
I said she was fine, I didn't say I was going to touch her
If you touch her I'll kick your ass you hear me?
Look at this, it's starting to come clear
Good

you're a real cool customer on the court, real chill out there, can't be rattled in your game, you don't even fall for that "nigger" shit out there on the court, but when it comes to your woman that's a different matter altogether, look at you I didn't even talk trash and you're already scared, I didn't even push up on the sister and you're already thinking about it this is good shit to know, I know your weakness
Shut the fuck up
Billy, you're like every other white boys I've ever met
And you're like every other brother I met on the play ground
Come on with it baby kick some shit
You'd rather look good and lose rather look bad and win, how many dinners did your necklace set your family back?
Fuck you, you don't know shit about me
Loan me a twenty
Come on Sid, do I look like Bank of America?
You think I'm going to lose this money to this white boy?
You better not lose my money to this white boy he's a visitor we're the home team baby
This here is a black thing, so give me twenty dollars so I can run this shit
We're going to at Sizzlers?
Damn right
A black man would rather miss than look bad.
